# üöÄ Antigravity Skills Dashboard | Jimbo OS
> **K.R.A.F.T. v3 Architecture**

This file contains the "Antigravity Skills" loaded into the VS Code environment as per user instructions. These skills represent the active capabilities of the Jimbo77 Agent.

## üèóÔ∏è Architecture & Design
- **api-design-principles**: Master REST and GraphQL API design principles to build intuitive, scalable, and maintainable APIs that delight developers.
- **architecture-decision-records**: Write and maintain Architecture Decision Records (ADRs) following best practices for technical decision documentation.
- **architecture-patterns**: Implement proven backend architecture patterns including Clean Architecture, Hexagonal Architecture, and Domain-Driven Design.
- **c4-architecture-c4-architecture**: Generate comprehensive C4 architecture documentation for an existing repository/codebase using a bottom-up analysis approach.
- **code-refactoring-tech-debt**: Identify, quantify, and prioritize technical debt in software projects. Analyze the codebase to uncover debt, assess its impact, and create actionable plans.
- **documentation-generation-doc-generate**: Create comprehensive, maintainable documentation from code. Generate API docs, architecture diagrams, user guides, and technical references.
- **legacy-modernizer**: Refactor legacy codebases, migrate outdated frameworks, and implement gradual modernization. Handles technical debt, dependency updates, and backward compatibility.
- **monorepo-management**: Master monorepo management with Turborepo, Nx, and pnpm workspaces to build efficient, scalable multi-package repositories.

## üíº Business & Strategy
- **business-analyst**: Master modern business analysis with AI-powered analytics, real-time dashboards, and data-driven insights. Build comprehensive KPI frameworks and strategic recommendations.
- **competitive-landscape**: Analyze competitors, assess competitive landscape, identify differentiation, evaluate market positioning, and apply Porter's Five Forces for competitive strategy analysis.
- **kpi-dashboard-design**: Design effective KPI dashboards with metrics selection, visualization best practices, and real-time monitoring patterns.
- **market-sizing-analysis**: Calculate TAM, determine SAM, estimate SOM, size the market, and calculate market opportunity for startups and business opportunities.
- **risk-manager**: Monitor portfolio risk, R-multiples, and position limits. Creates hedging strategies, calculates expectancy, and implements stop-losses.
- **sales-automator**: Draft cold emails, follow-ups, and proposal templates. Creates pricing pages, case studies, and sales scripts for sales outreach and lead nurturing.
- **seo-content-planner**: Creates comprehensive content outlines and topic clusters for SEO. Plans content calendars and identifies topic gaps for content strategy and planning.
- **seo-keyword-strategist**: Analyzes keyword usage in provided content, calculates density, suggests semantic variations and LSI keywords based on the topic. Prevents over-optimization.
- **startup-financial-modeling**: Create financial projections, build financial models, forecast revenue, calculate burn rate, estimate runway, and model cash flow for 3-5 year financial planning.
- **startup-metrics-framework**: Track key startup metrics, SaaS metrics, CAC and LTV, unit economics, burn multiple, rule of 40, and marketplace metrics for business performance optimization.
- **team-composition-analysis**: Plan team structure, determine hiring needs, design org chart, calculate compensation, and plan equity allocation for organizational design and headcount planning.

## üß† Data & AI
- **data-engineering-data-pipeline**: Data pipeline architecture expert specializing in scalable, reliable, and cost-effective data pipelines for batch and streaming data processing.
- **data-scientist**: Expert data scientist for advanced analytics, machine learning, and statistical modeling. Handles complex data analysis, predictive modeling, and business intelligence.
- **data-storytelling**: Transform data into compelling narratives using visualization, context, and persuasive structure for presenting analytics to stakeholders.
- **mlops-engineer**: Build comprehensive ML pipelines, experiment tracking, and model registries with MLflow, Kubeflow, and modern MLOps tools. Implements automated training, deployment, and monitoring.
- **prompt-engineer**: Expert prompt engineer specializing in advanced prompting techniques, LLM optimization, and AI system design. Masters chain-of-thought, constitutional AI, and production prompt strategies.
- **python-performance-optimization**: Profile and optimize Python code using cProfile, memory profilers, and performance best practices for debugging slow code and improving application performance.
- **rag-implementation**: Build Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems for LLM applications with vector databases and semantic search for knowledge-grounded AI and document Q&A systems.
- **sql-pro**: Master modern SQL with cloud-native databases, OLTP/OLAP optimization, and advanced query techniques. Expert in performance tuning, data modeling, and hybrid analytical systems.
- **vector-database-engineer**: Expert in vector databases, embedding strategies, and semantic search implementation. Masters Pinecone, Weaviate, Qdrant, Milvus, and pgvector for RAG applications.

## üíª Development
- **api-testing-observability-api-mock**: API mocking expert specializing in realistic mock services for development, testing, and demos. Design mocks that simulate real API behavior and enable parallel development.
- **code-review-excellence**: Master effective code review practices to provide constructive feedback, catch bugs early, and foster knowledge sharing while maintaining team morale.
- **fastapi-pro**: Build high-performance async APIs with FastAPI, SQLAlchemy 2.0, and Pydantic V2. Master microservices, WebSockets, and modern Python async patterns.
- **frontend-security-coder**: Expert in secure frontend coding practices specializing in XSS prevention, output sanitization, and client-side security patterns for frontend security implementations.
- **git-advanced-workflows**: Master advanced Git workflows including rebasing, cherry-picking, bisect, worktrees, and reflog to maintain clean history and recover from any situation.
- **python-packaging**: Create distributable Python packages with proper project structure, setup.py/pyproject.toml, and publishing to PyPI for packaging libraries and CLI tools.
- **react-modernization**: Upgrade React applications to latest versions, migrate from class components to hooks, and adopt concurrent features for modernizing React codebases.
- **react-state-management**: Master modern React state management with Redux Toolkit, Zustand, Jotai, and React Query for setting up global state and managing server state.
- **tailwind-design-system**: Build scalable design systems with Tailwind CSS, design tokens, component libraries, and responsive patterns for creating component libraries and standardizing UI patterns.
- **typescript-pro**: Master TypeScript with advanced types, generics, and strict type safety. Handles complex type systems, decorators, and enterprise-grade patterns.

## ‚öôÔ∏è Infrastructure & Operations
- **bash-defensive-patterns**: Master defensive Bash programming techniques for production-grade scripts. Use when writing robust shell scripts, CI/CD pipelines, or system utilities requiring fault tolerance.
- **cicd-automation-workflow-automate**: Workflow automation expert specializing in creating efficient CI/CD pipelines, GitHub Actions workflows, and automated development processes.
- **cost-optimization**: Optimize cloud costs through resource rightsizing, tagging strategies, reserved instances, and spending analysis for reducing cloud expenses and implementing cost governance.
- **database-admin**: Expert database administrator specializing in modern cloud databases, automation, and reliability engineering. Masters AWS/Azure/GCP database services and Infrastructure as Code.
- **devops-troubleshooter**: Expert DevOps troubleshooter specializing in rapid incident response, advanced debugging, and modern observability. Masters log analysis, distributed tracing, and Kubernetes debugging.
- **incident-response-incident-response**: Incident response expert for handling production outages, system failures, and security incidents with structured response protocols and post-mortem analysis.
- **observability-engineer**: Build production-ready monitoring, logging, and tracing systems. Implements comprehensive observability strategies, SLI/SLO management, and incident response workflows.
- **security-auditor**: Expert security auditor specializing in DevSecOps, comprehensive cybersecurity, and compliance frameworks. Masters vulnerability assessment, threat modeling, and OWASP standards.
- **terraform-specialist**: Expert Terraform/OpenTofu specialist mastering advanced IaC automation, state management, and enterprise infrastructure patterns. Handles complex module design and multi-cloud deployments.

## ü¶Å Jimbo Custom
- **crush-squad**: Orchestrates a virtual 3-agent team (Analyst, Coder, Verifier) for complex coding tasks, bug fixes, and system repairs. Use when robustness and verification are critical.
- **jimbo-protocols**: Enforces the Jimbo K.R.A.F.T. v3 architecture standards, including Workspace Integrity, Conditional Simulation, and Golden Standard implementation for all complex tasks.

## üé® UI/UX
- **ui-ux-pro-max**: AI-powered design intelligence with 67+ styles, 96+ color palettes, and automated design system generation for professional UI/UX across multiple platforms and frameworks.
